channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: World's Greatest Mother
channel.desc: This Mother's Day special is dedicated to Our Lady as a model for all mothers. Loretta Young, Ethel Barrymore, Ruth Hussey, and Gene Lockhart lead an all-star cast. Solos by Ann Blyth, Nan Merriman and Ann Jamison are featured. (30 minutes).
